TASK: Craft an item of type: end_stone_brick_stairs
inventory=[{"type": "yellow_carpet", "quantity": 60, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 36, "index": 20}, {"type": "diamond_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "end_stone_bricks", "quantity": 6, "index": 30}, {"type": "oak_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 33}, {"type": "arrow", "quantity": 40, "index": 34}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "chicken", "quantity": 48, "index": 41}, {"type": "brown_mushroom_block", "quantity": 64, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft end_stone_brick_stairs, I need to place 6 end_stone_bricks in a U shape in the crafting grid. I will start by moving 1 end_stone_brick to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1
